Description: Green glazed composition shabti of Tawahtamun born of Taremetbast with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard, crossed hands in relief holding an incised adze, a hoe and the string of the seed-basket which hangs over the shoulder, the front of the leg section and the back-pillar are inscribed with incised hieroglyphs; there is a plinth beneath the feet.
